name: Slot Destruction
description:
Slot Destruction - Made for SAE 1HP GameJam. 

Theme; How can we Chalenge Players Without using Hit Points? 

 Slot Destruction  is about killing an enemy that starts off with full health via a slot machine . You will press the play button and depending what combination you the player gets will determin the outcocome wether the enemy gets damage or is healed.  The player can return to the main menue with no effect but if they risk it for the biscuit and lose with the enemy on full health the player will die. 

How to play: 

1. Press Play button on Slot 

2. Wait for Results

3.Deal Required Enemy Damage Enemy Damage 

4. Try again or head back to menu
